text: Hi everyone! I’m an indie developer and excited to share Depths of Endor, my retro-inspired dungeon RPG. Check out the game and let me know what you think! Download for iOS and iPad: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/depths-of-endor-dungeon-rpg/id6702012149 Depths Of Endor: Dungeon RPG Embark on an epic journey in this classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Dive into a retro-styled adventure that combi… DetailsEmbark on an epic journey in this classic, turn-based dungeon crawler RPG! Dive into a retro-styled adventure that combines the best elements of old-school role-playing games with modern features. Explore dangerous dungeons, defeat fearsome monsters, and uncover hidden treasures as you guide your hero through a world full of challenges. # Choose Your Hero: - Play as one of 5 unique races: Elf, Human, Dwarf, Gnome, or Troll, each with distinct abilities and stats. - Customize your hero’s journey by joining 7 different guilds: Nomad, Warrior, Thief, Mage, Healer, Paladin, or Ninja. Each guild offers unique skills and playstyles. # Classic Turn-Based Combat: - Experience tactical and strategic combat as you face off against challenging foes. - Master your skills, equip powerful weapons, and use potions to survive the toughest battles. - Collect a variety of weapons, from simple swords to rare magical items! # Explore Dangerous Dungeons: - Venture into 2 expansive dungeons filled with traps, hidden passages, and powerful enemies. - Find hidden secrets and treasures as you navigate through multiple levels. - Each dungeon offers a different challenge and environment, keeping the experience fresh and exciting. # Guilds & Skills: - Join a guild to unlock special abilities and improve your hero’s skills. - Train with fellow members to become stronger and more adept in your chosen path. - Become the ultimate warrior, thief, or mage as you rise through the ranks! # Daily Rewards & In-Game Shop: - Collect gold from daily chests to help you on your journey. - Visit the shop to purchase weapons, armor, and other items to boost your hero’s power. - Find normal and magical items to strengthen your character and prepare for tougher challenges ahead. # Features: - Retro pixel art style that brings back the charm of classic RPGs. - Turn-based gameplay that emphasizes strategy and planning. - An in-depth character progression system with countless ways to build your hero. - Newly released game with regular updates, new dungeons, items and features based on player feedback! # Why Play? - Nostalgic RPG experience with a modern twist. - Endless opportunities for character customization. - Engaging, turn-based combat with an emphasis on tactics and strategy. - A growing world with new content added regularly. Be among the first to join us on this journey and help shape the future of this retro dungeon-crawling RPG! Whether you're a seasoned adventurer or new to the genre, there's something for everyone. Explore, fight, and become the hero you were meant to be. Download now and start your adventure today! Seller:Javier Hernandez Torres Genre:Role Playing, Strategy TouchArcade Rating:Unrated Compatibility:HD Universal I think the problem first would be the iAPs, how those iAPs work? can you explain about them? Well, for supporting the game you can buy gold, that later you can use it for buy items in the store, change the guild, reset stats... Also, you can buy item packs for help you at the start. I made a discord server to help people get started as it can be quite complicated at first: https://discord.gg/rFGeYwM7 Patreon Silver I've also added a thread for this game on the TA Discord. Thanks for posting, feel free to join us there! Share This Page
